CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
    WITH (
        borough         VARCHAR(15),
        trip_date       DATE,
        trip_day        VARCHAR(10),
        trip_day_weekend_ind CHAR(1),
        card_trip_count INT,
        cash_trip_count INT,
        street_hail_trip_count INT,
        dispatch_trip_count    INT,
        trip_distance          FLOAT,
        trip_duration          INT,
        fare_amount            FLOAT
  ) AS [result];

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.calendar') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar
WITH (LOCATION = 'calendar/', DATA_SOURCE = [adw_raw], FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat])
AS
  select cast(date_id as int) as day_id
	   , cast(month_id as int) as month_id
	   , cast(substring(month_id,1,4) as int)  year_id
       , fiscal_month as fiscal_month_nm
       , fiscal_quarter as fiscal_quarter_nm
       , fiscal_year as fiscal_year_nm
    from bronze.vw_calendar

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.rate_code') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/rate_code',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS rate_code
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH(
      rate_code_id TINYINT,
      rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
  );


 SELECT * FROM silver.rate_code;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type

    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/payment_type',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT payment_type, description
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',

      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',

  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt   NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month + 
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
                LOCATION = ''silver/trip_data_green/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS
        SELECT [VendorID] AS vendor_id
                ,[lpep_pickup_datetime]
                ,[lpep_dropoff_datetime]
                ,[store_and_fwd_flag]
                ,[total_amount]
                ,[payment_type]
                ,[trip_type]
                ,[congestion_surcharge]
                ,[extra]
                ,[mta_tax]
                ,[tip_amount]
                ,[tolls_amount]
                ,[ehail_fee]
                ,[improvement_surcharge]
                ,[RatecodeID] AS rate_code_id
                ,[PULocationID] AS pu_location_id
                ,[DOLocationID] AS do_location_id
                ,[passenger_count]
                ,[trip_distance]
                ,[fare_amount]
        FROM bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv
        WHERE year = ''' + @year + '''
          AND month = ''' + @month + '''';    

    print(@create_sql_stmt)

    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month;

    print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;

END;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt   NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month + 
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
                LOCATION = ''gold/trip_data_green/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS
        SELECT td.year,
            td.month,
            tz.borough,
            CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date,
            cal.day_name AS trip_day,
            CASE WHEN cal.day_name IN (''Saturday'',''Sunday'') THEN ''Y'' ELSE ''N'' END AS trip_day_weekend_ind,
            SUM(CASE WHEN pt.description = ''Credit card'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trip_count,
            SUM(CASE WHEN pt.description = ''Cash'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trip_count,
            SUM(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = ''Street-hail'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS street_hail_trip_count,
            SUM(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = ''Dispatch'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dispatch_trip_count ,
            SUM(td.trip_distance) AS trip_distance,
            SUM(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime, td.lpep_dropoff_datetime)) AS trip_duration,
            SUM(td.fare_amount) AS fare_amount            
        FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td
        JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
        JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (cal.date = CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
        JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
        JOIN silver.trip_type tt ON (td.trip_type = tt.trip_type)
        WHERE td.year = ''' + @year + '''
          AND td.month = ''' + @month + '''
        GROUP BY td.year,
                td.month,
                tz.borough,
                CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime),
                cal.day_name  ';    

    print(@create_sql_stmt)

    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month;

    print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;

END;

-- Create file format csv_file_format for parser version 2.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format  
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '2.0' )   
      );

 SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, ''$.payment_type'') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,

  FROM OPENROWSET(

  )
  WITH
  (

  ) AS payment_type';

  FROM OPENROWSET(

      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH

  ) AS payment_type

-----------------------------------------------------
-- Reading data from JSON with arrays
-----------------------------------------------------
SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_0,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_01
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type;

-- Use openjson to explode the array
SELECT  payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH
  (
      payment_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
  )
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
  WITH(
      sub_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
  );

    ) AS [result]

-- File metadata function filename()
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',

    ) AS [result]


SELECT

    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();

-- Limit Data using filename()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',

        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')

    ) AS [result]

/*
Assignment
----------
1) query from folders using wildcard characters
2) use filename function
3) query from subfolders
4) use filepath function to select only from certain partitions
*/

-- 1) Query using wildcard characters
SELECT TOP 100 *
  FROM OPENROWSET (
      BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
  ) AS trip_data

       trip_data.filename() AS file_name,
       trip_data.*
  FROM OPENROWSET (
      BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
  ) AS trip_data

       trip_data.filepath() AS file_path,
       trip_data.*
  FROM OPENROWSET (
      BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
  ) AS trip_data

-- 4) Use filepath to target partitions
SELECT trip_data.filepath(1) AS year,
       trip_data.filepath(2) AS month,
       COUNT(1) AS record_count
  FROM OPENROWSET (
      BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
  ) AS trip_data
 WHERE trip_data.filepath(1) = '2020'
   AND trip_data.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')

ORDER BY trip_data.filepath(1), trip_data.filepath(2);

    SELECT payment_type, description
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    );


END;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_load_products_raw
@esp_dt VARCHAR(8)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt   NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.products_' + @esp_dt  + 
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = adw_raw,
                LOCATION = ''products/batch_dt=' + @esp_dt + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
            )
        AS
        select p.product_id
             , p.sku_num
             , p.product_nm
             , p.category_nm
             , p.sub_category_nm
             , s.item_price as item_price_amt
             , p.standard_cost_amt  
             , p.color_nm, p.model_nm
             , s.batch_dt
          from bronze.vw_products p join silver.vw_sales s 
            on p.product_id  = s.product_id
         where s.batch_dt = ''' + @esp_dt + '''
        ';    

    print(@create_sql_stmt)

    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.products_' + @esp_dt ;

    print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;

END;

## Trip Data Aggregation 
### Group By Columns
1. year
2. Month
3. Pickup Location ID
4. Drop Off Location ID

### Aggregated Columns
1. Total Trip Count
2. Total Fare Amount

### Purpose of the notebook

Demonstrate the integration between Spark Pool and Serverless SQL Pool

1. Create the aggregated table in Spark Pool
2. Access the data from Serverless SQL Pool

#Set the folder paths so that it can be used later. 
bronze_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
silver_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'
gold_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/gold'
#Set the spark config to be able to get the partitioned columns year and month as strings rather than integers
spark.conf.set("spark.sql.sources.partitionColumnTypeInference.enabled", "false")

# Read the silver data to be processed. 
trip_data_green_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/trip_data_green") 
trip_data_green_df.createOrReplaceTempView('ref_silver_trip_data_green')

# Perform the required aggregations
# 1. Total trip count
# 2. Total fare amount

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

trip_data_green_agg_df = trip_data_green_df \
                        .groupBy("year", "month", "pu_location_id", "do_location_id") \
                        .agg(count(lit(1)).alias("total_trip_count"),
                        round(sum("fare_amount"), 2).alias("total_fare_amount"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption

trip_data_green_agg_df.repartition(2).write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year", "month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg")

%%sql

insert overwrite table nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg partition (year='2022', month)
select pu_location_id, do_location_id, count(*) total_trip_count, sum(fare_amount) as total_fare_amount,  month
  from ref_silver_trip_data_green
 where year=2020
 group by year, month, pu_location_id, do_location_id
 distribute by year, month

# Define column headers
columns = ["Employee","Salary"]

# Define data for original dataframe
empOriginal = [("Employee_1",50000),("Employee_2",55000)]

# Define data for updates dataframe
empUpdates = [("Employee_1",50000),("Employee_2",60000),("Employee_3",55000)]

# Create dataframe with orignial employee data
dfOriginal = spark.createDataFrame(data = empOriginal,schema = columns)

# Create dataframe with updated employee data
dfUpdates = spark.createDataFrame(data = empUpdates,schema = columns)

# Display dfOriginal
dfOriginal.show()

# Display dfUpdates
dfUpdates.show()

# Create temp views of both the dfOriginal and dfUpdates dataframes 
# so that we can easily query them with Spark SQL later

#dfOriginal
dfOriginal.createOrReplaceTempView('Employee_Original')

#dfUpdates
dfUpdates.createOrReplaceTempView('Employee_Updates')

%%sql
-- Create Delta Lake table, define schema and location
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DELTA_Employees (
  Employee STRING NOT NULL,
  Salary INT NOT NULL,
  BeginDate DATE NOT NULL,
  EndDate DATE NOT NULL,
  CurrentRecord INT NOT NULL 
)
USING DELTA
-- specify data lake folder location
LOCATION '/Delta_Demo/Employees/'

%%sql
-- Merge statement to handle upsert of dfOrginal dataset into DELTA_Employees table
MERGE INTO delta_employees t
USING (
    SELECT emp.Employee AS MergeKey, emp.*
    FROM Employee_Original AS emp

    UNION ALL

    SELECT NULL AS MergeKey, emp.*
    FROM Employee_Original AS emp
    JOIN delta_employees AS de ON emp.Employee = de.Employee
    WHERE de.CurrentRecord = 1 AND emp.Salary <> de.Salary
) s
ON t.Employee = s.MergeKey
WHEN MATCHED AND t.CurrentRecord = 1 AND t.Salary <> s.Salary THEN
  UPDATE SET t.CurrentRecord = 0, t.EndDate = (CURRENT_DATE)
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (Employee, Salary, BeginDate, EndDate, CurrentRecord) VALUES (s.Employee, s.Salary, CURRENT_DATE, '2999-12-31',1)

%%sql
-- Merge statement to handle upsert of dfUpdates into DELTA_Employees table
MERGE INTO delta_employees t
USING (
    SELECT emp.Employee AS MergeKey, emp.*
    FROM Employee_Updates AS emp

    UNION ALL

    SELECT NULL AS MergeKey, emp.*
    FROM Employee_Updates AS emp
    JOIN delta_employees AS de ON emp.Employee = de.Employee
    WHERE de.CurrentRecord = 1 AND emp.Salary <> de.Salary
) s
ON t.Employee = s.MergeKey
WHEN MATCHED AND t.CurrentRecord = 1 AND t.Salary <> s.Salary THEN
  UPDATE SET t.CurrentRecord = 0, t.EndDate = (CURRENT_DATE)
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (Employee, Salary, BeginDate, EndDate, CurrentRecord) VALUES (s.Employee, s.Salary, CURRENT_DATE, '2999-12-31',1)

%%sql
-- Retrieve the version/change history of the Delta table
DESCRIBE HISTORY default.DELTA_Employees

# Load a previous version of the DELTA_Employees table into a dataframe
df = spark.read.format("delta").option("versionAsOf", 2).load("/Delta_Demo/Employees/")
df.show()

# A compact will let us write out the contents of our Delta table into a specified number of files.
(spark.read
 .format("delta")
 .load("/Delta_Demo/Employees/") #delta table folder to read from
 .repartition(1) #number of files to write
 .write
 .option("dataChange", "false") #do not change the data
 .format("delta")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .save("/Delta_Demo/Employees/")) #location to write new file(s)

%%sql
--Vacuum files where table version is older than 10 days 
VACUUM default.DELTA_Employees RETAIN 240 HOURS

esp_date = 20170711
base_path = "abfss://adventure-works@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net"
raw_folder_path = f'{base_path}/raw'
sys = mssparkutils.notebook

try:
    raw_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{raw_folder_path}/products/batch_dt={esp_date}/*.parquet")
except:

raw_df.createOrReplaceTempView('ref_product_raw')
raw_df.show()
## Recreate Target table

%%sql

USE adv_edw;

DROP table if exists product_dim;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_dim (
	sku_num VARCHAR(100) not null,
    effective_date date,
    end_date date,
	product_nm VARCHAR(200),
	category_nm VARCHAR(100),
	sub_category_nm VARCHAR(100),
	item_price_amt decimal(8,2),
	standard_cost_amt decimal(8,2),
	color_nm VARCHAR(100),
	load_ts timestamp,
	raw_batch_dt int,
    current_record_ind int
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (current_record_ind)
## Init parameters

batch_start_date = "20170711"
batch_end_date = "20170715"
path_base = "abfss://adventure-works@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net"
## Read source table

df = spark.read.parquet(f"{path_base}/raw/products/").createOrReplaceTempView('ref_raw_products')
spark.conf.set("batch_start_date", batch_start_date)
spark.conf.set("batch_end_date", batch_end_date)
## Write to target table

%%sql

insert overwrite table adv_edw.product_dim partition(current_record_ind)
select 
       sku_num
     , to_date(${batch_end_date},"yyyyMMdd") as effective_date
     , '9999-12-31' as end_date
      , product_nm
      , category_nm
      , sub_category_nm
      , item_price_amt
      , standard_cost_amt
      , color_nm
      , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as load_ts
      , batch_dt as raw_batch_dt
      , 1 as current_record_ind
  from (
        select *
            , row_number()  OVER (PARTITION BY sku_num ORDER BY batch_dt desc) AS last_value
        from ref_raw_products
       where batch_dt between ${batch_start_date} and ${batch_end_date} 
      ) v
  where last_value = 1
  distribute by current_record_ind
        sort by sku_num
## Recreate Target table

%%sql

USE adv_edw;

## Init parameters

batch_start_date = "20170711"
batch_end_date = "20170715"
path_base = "abfss://adventure-works@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net"

#display(df.limit(5))
### Read Sales RAW table

#spark.read.option("basePath", path_raw_sales).parquet(f"{path_raw_sales}/batch_dt=*/*.parquet").createOrReplaceTempView('ref_raw')

spark.read.parquet(f'{path_base}/raw/sales/').createOrReplaceTempView('ref_raw_sales')
 
sql = f"""
select 
       s.pos_transaction_id
     , p.sku_num
     , s.item_price as item_price_amt
     , s.item_qty 
     , s.batch_dt as raw_batch_dt

  from ref_raw_sales s
  left join ref_raw_products p on s.product_id = p.product_id and s.batch_dt = p.batch_dt
 where s.batch_dt between {batch_start_date} AND {batch_end_date}

%%sql
DESCRIBE HISTORY adv_edw.calendar_dim
base_path = "abfss://adventure-works@issynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net"

%%pyspark

spark.conf.set("esp_date", esp_date)  

try:
    spark.read.parquet(f"{base_path}/raw/products/batch_dt={esp_date}/*.parquet").createOrReplaceTempView('ref_product_raw')
except:
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit(f"cannot load batch_dt={esp_date} file")  

sql = f"""
select 
      sku_num, product_nm, category_nm, sub_category_nm
    , item_price_amt, standard_cost_amt, color_nm, model_nm
    , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as load_ts 
    , batch_dt as raw_batch_dt 
  from (
        select *
            , row_number()  OVER (PARTITION BY sku_num ORDER BY batch_dt desc) AS last_value
        from ref_product_raw
      )
where last_value = 1
"""
raw_df = spark.sql(sql)
raw_df.createOrReplaceTempView('ref_product_raw')
#raw_df.show(50)

%%sql

-- Merge statement to handle upsert of RAW dataset into TRG table
MERGE INTO adv_edw.product_dim t
USING (
    SELECT sku_num AS MergeKey, 
           raw.sku_num, raw.product_nm, raw.category_nm, raw.sub_category_nm
         , raw.item_price_amt, raw.standard_cost_amt, raw.color_nm
         , raw.load_ts, raw.raw_batch_dt
    FROM ref_product_raw raw

    UNION ALL

    SELECT null AS MergeKey, 
           raw.sku_num, raw.product_nm, raw.category_nm, raw.sub_category_nm
         , raw.item_price_amt, raw.standard_cost_amt, raw.color_nm
         , raw.load_ts, raw.raw_batch_dt
    FROM ref_product_raw AS raw
    JOIN adv_edw.product_dim AS trg ON trg.sku_num = raw.sku_num
    WHERE trg.current_record_ind = 1 
      AND ( trg.product_nm <> raw.product_nm
         or trg.item_price_amt <> raw.item_price_amt
          )
) s
ON t.sku_num = s.MergeKey
WHEN MATCHED AND t.current_record_ind = 1 
 AND ( t.product_nm <> s.product_nm
    or t.category_nm <> s.category_nm
    or t.sub_category_nm <> s.sub_category_nm
    or t.item_price_amt <> s.item_price_amt
    or t.standard_cost_amt <> s.standard_cost_amt
    or t.color_nm <> s.color_nm
    )
 THEN
  UPDATE SET t.current_record_ind = 0, t.end_date = (to_date('${esp_date}',"yyyyMMdd"))
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (sku_num, effective_date, end_date, product_nm, category_nm, sub_category_nm, 
          item_price_amt, standard_cost_amt, color_nm, load_ts, raw_batch_dt, current_record_ind) 
  VALUES (s.sku_num, to_date('${esp_date}',"yyyyMMdd"), '9999-12-31', s.product_nm, s.category_nm, s.sub_category_nm, 
          s.item_price_amt, s.standard_cost_amt, s.color_nm, s.load_ts, s.raw_batch_dt, 1)

## Perform Transformations

%%sql

create or replace temporary view ref_stg_sales  AS

select 
       s.pos_transaction_id
     , p.sku_num
     , s.item_price as item_price_amt
     , s.item_qty 
     , s.batch_dt as raw_batch_dt
     , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as load_ts 
     , to_date(s.transaction_dt,"yyyyMMdd") as transaction_date
  from ref_raw_sales s
  left outer join ref_raw_products p on s.product_id = p.product_id and s.batch_dt = p.batch_dt and p.batch_dt = ${esp_date}
  where s.batch_dt = ${esp_date}
## Write to Target table

%%sql

insert overwrite table adv_edw.sales_fct partition(transaction_date)
select pos_transaction_id
     , sku_num
     , item_price_amt
     , item_qty 
     , raw_batch_dt
     , load_ts 
     , transaction_date
  from ref_stg_sales
  ;

%%sql

USE adv_edw;

DROP table if exists product_dim;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_dim (
	sku_num VARCHAR(100) not null,
    effective_date date,
    end_date date,
	product_nm VARCHAR(200),
	category_nm VARCHAR(100),
	sub_category_nm VARCHAR(100),
	item_price_amt decimal(8,2),
	standard_cost_amt decimal(8,2),
	color_nm VARCHAR(100),
	load_ts timestamp,
	raw_batch_dt int,
  current_record_ind int

)
USING DELTA
